Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Triad
Description: This amulet in green faience takes the form of a plaque decorated with three divinities. In the middle is Horus the Child, shown naked. He is flanked by the two sisters Isis and Nephthys. The piece which dates from the Late Period was part of the collection of Ã‰. de Meester de Ravestein.
